name: UpdateServiceRequest
description:
Update an existing service request in Freshservice.

Use this tool to update details of an existing service request in Freshservice when changes are needed.

parameters.name: service_request_id
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the service request that needs to be updated in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: ID of Service Request to update

parameters.name: service_request_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the service request to be updated, including fields such as requester email, subject, status, etc.

requester_email.description: the email id of the requester

requested_for_email.description: the email id of the user for whom this is requested.

agent_id.description: the agent ID to whom the ticket is assigned

due_by.description: Timestamp that denotes when the ticket is due to be resolved

group_id.description: ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. The default value is the ID of the group that is associated with the given email_config_id.

source.description: The channel through which the ticket was created. The default value is 2.

tags.description: Tags that have been associated with the ticket.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: service_request_id
parameters.description: ID of Service Request to update

custom_fields.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity
